tag_list: mobile, web, android, iphone, facebook, social-apps, cross-platform-apps, pyhton, java, rubyonrails, php
overview:
Xapstr is a mobile and web development studio working for more than 3 years on platforms like RubyonRails, Python, PHP and intent on delivering high quality work to their clientele. The customers, spread throughout the globe, have always been more than satisfied with the work done with Xapstr having a strong belief that the expectations of the customer are always the foundation on which greater work can be built.

The core work of Xapstr is focused on web development, iphone apps, android apps, facebook apps, social apps, cross platform apps along with the potential expertise to solve any challenge for a customer.
